variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: PARTICIPANT ID [Visit 9]

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: CONTACT OCCASION [Visit 9]

variable.name: HCTA1
variable.description: 1. Is there a particular place that you usually go to when you are sick or need advice about you health? [Visit 9]

variable.name: HCTA2A
variable.description: 2a. What kind of place is it that you usually go? [Visit 9]

variable.name: HCTA3
variable.description: 3. Thinking about the place you usually go for help with your medical problems, in general, how much do you trust them to take good care you? do you trust them very much, somewhat, not very much, or not at all? [Visit 9]

variable.name: HCTA4A
variable.description: 4a. How much do you trust your doctor to: offer you high-quality medical care. [Visit 9]

variable.name: HCTA4B
variable.description: 4b. How much do you trust your doctor to: do all necessary medical tests and procedures regardless of cost [Visit 9]

variable.name: HCTA4C
variable.description: 4c. How much do you trust your doctor to: do only medically necessary test and procedures [Visit 9]

variable.name: HCTA4D
variable.description: 4d. how much do you trust your doctor 's judgement about your health care [Visit 9]

variable.name: HCTA5A
variable.description: 5a. How would you rate how well your doctor listens to you? [Visit 9]

variable.name: HCTA5B
variable.description: 5b. How would you rate how well your doctor explains things to you in a way you can understand? [Visit 9]

variable.name: HCTA6A
variable.description: 6a. Generally, how much do you trust doctors and other health care providers? [Visit 9]

variable.name: HCTA6B
variable.description: 6b. Generally how much do you trust other people? [Visit 9]

variable.name: HCTA6C
variable.description: 6c. How much do you trust the health care system? [Visit 9]

variable.name: HCTA6D
variable.description: 6d. How much do you trust hospitals? [Visit 9]

variable.name: HCTA7A
variable.description: 7a. I have complete trust in my health insurance plan or company [Visit 9]

variable.name: HCTA7B
variable.description: 7b. I worry there are a lot of loopholes in my health insurance plan that I do not know about [Visit 9]

variable.name: HCTA7C
variable.description: 7c. My plan cares more about saving money than about getting me the treatment I need [Visit 9]

variable.name: HCTA8
variable.description: 8. When was the last time you saw a health care provider for treatment of a medical problem? [Visit 9]
variable.value: At least 1 year, but less than 2 year
At least 2 years, but less than 4 yea

variable.name: HCTA9
variable.description: 9. When was the last time you saw a health care provider for a routine physical exam or general checkup, that is when you were not sick or pregnant? [Visit 9]
variable.value: At least 1 year, but less than 2 year
At least 2 years, but less than 4 yea

variable.name: HCTA10
variable.description: 10. Overall how hard has it been for you to get the health services you have needed? would you say it has been very hard, fairly hard, not too hard at all, not hard at all? [Visit 9]

variable.name: HCTAflag
variable.description: Data record present? [Visit 9]

variable.name: VERS
variable.description: FORM VERSION [Visit 9]
